alert.note: Alert for Union (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 29 at 2:11PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Union County through 245 PM CST... At 210 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wesson, or near Junction City, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... El Dorado, Junction City, Calion, Urbana, Lawson, Wesson, Moro Bay State Park, Newell, New London, Pigeon Hill, Hillsboro, Three Creeks and Catesville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for south central Arkansas...and northwestern Louisiana.
